justification: "Clustering was measured via the Adjusted Ratio of Clustering (ARC; Roenker et al., 1971)" – indicating that the construct of clustering was quantified with the ARC metric.

topic_or_construct: Semantic similarity between candidate and target words
measured_by: Random-walk associative model based on the Small World of Words (SWOW) dataset
justification: "Semantic similarity was operationalized via an random walk associative model based on the Small World of Words (SWOW) dataset" – specifying that semantic similarity was measured using this computational model.
